text: Fugly (or F*UGLY, as it appears on the poster) is a 2014 Indian movie that is played in the Hindi language, the national language of India. It came to theatres on 13 June 2014. This movie features actors like Kiara Advani, which was her first time in a movie. == References == ==Other websites== * * Category:2010s Hindi-language movies Category:2010s Indian movies Category:2014 thriller movies Category:2014 movies Category:2014 comedy-drama movies
title: Fugly (movie)
